name: Piccolo - CSW
description: Cinematic Studio Woodwinds Piccolo. Brilliant, piercing high register providing orchestral sparkle. Powerful despite small size.

legato.description: Legato is for MONO parts only - smooth transition between single notes. Enable legato (velocity ≥64) when playing single melodic lines. Disable legato (velocity <64) when 2+ notes sound simultaneously. Re-enable when returning to mono. Prefer keyswitch over CC for legato control.

ai.system_prompt_template: Generate piccolo parts for Cinematic Studio Woodwinds. Use CC1 for dynamics on long articulations, velocity for short articulations. LEGATO: Keyswitch Ab1 toggles legato (velocity ≥64 on, <64 off). IMPORTANT: Legato is for MONO parts only - use it for smooth note-to-note transitions in single melodic lines. Disable legato before any polyphonic passages (2+ simultaneous notes), re-enable when returning to mono melody. Switch articulations via CC58. Playable range D5-C8, preferred D5-C7.
